snippet: If you do not grind your beans right before brewing, you are never going to taste everything a top-shelf coffee has to offer.
abstract: Grinding coffee beans correctly is essential to making good cup of coffee, as flavors and aromatics concentrated inside coffee bean are exposed by grinding.
lead_paragraph: If you do not grind your beans right before brewing, you are never going to taste everything a top-shelf coffee has to offer.

headline.seo: A Good Grinder Is the Key to Better Coffee
headline.main: Better Coffee Depends on Good Grinding
headline.print_headline: Better Cup Depends On Proper Grinding
